revised_title: Henry Lewis Guy: Turbine Designer and Engineering Administrator
tldr: Henry Lewis Guy was a prominent turbine designer and engineering administrator who worked for the British Westinghouse Company and later the Metropolitan-Vickers Electrical Company. His career spanned significant advancements in steam turbine technology, including regenerative feed heating and multi-exhaust systems. Guy also contributed to the development of steam turbine locomotives and played a role in early aero gas turbine development. His work and influence in the field of mechanical engineering are celebrated in this article.
